As PSP Variable Property

Property of PSP Variable Container.

Converts the class of a reference from PSP Container to PSP Variable. Because some variable objects, such as network-published I/O variables, function as both PSP Variables and PSP Containers, you might need to use the As PSP Variable and As PSP Container properties to refer to the same variable object both as a PSP Variable and as a PSP Container.

Data Type

Variable reference

Permissions

Read Only
